description: DebateTopic is a debate topic generator which can give you a randomly generated sentence made out of a bunch of randomly selected words so you can practice your impromptu speech skills. To start using the debate topic generator, say 'open debate topic,' or, 'open debate topic and give me a debate topic.' No prerequisites necessary
exampleInteractions: Alexa, open debate topic and give me a debate topic
Alexa, ask debate topic to give me a topic.
name: DebateTopic
shortDescription: Randomly generates a phrase out of a couple words so you can practice impromptu speeches.
